tool_description: SimpleSent is an image sentiment analysis API. It identifies and interprets emotions portrayed within an image. There are several use cases such as analyzing emotions in editorial illustrations, product reviews, and social media posts. At this time, our models have high accuracy and perform well under edge-case scenarios.
name: Image Sentiment Analysis
title: Image Sentiment Analysis

api_list.name: sentiment
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com/sentiment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-sentiment-analysis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
